EmailTemplate.name: BCBS MT acknowledgement
EmailTemplate.subject: BCBS of Montana Demographic Change Request Form Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Name_Submitter__c} ({!Case.Title_Submitter__c}), Thank you for contacting Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Montana. This email is confirmation we have received your request, case number {!Case.CaseNumber}, for {!Case.Name_of_Provider_Group__c}. Your request may take up to 14 days to complete. Once completed, a notification will be sent to the email address submitted with the Demographic Change Request Form.
To check on the status of your request or for any questions, contact Network Management at 800-447-7828 (toll free), Extension 6100, or email "HCS-X6100@bcbsmt.com". Sincerely,
Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Montana
